snippet: The Russian Supreme Court has ordered a review of the case against two members of the punk band Pussy Riot.
abstract: Russian Supreme Court orders review of case against Nadezhda Tolokonnikova and Maria Alyokhina, members of punk band Pussy Riot; court says lower courts failed to provide full evidence of their guilt and overlooked mitigating factors.
lead_paragraph: The Russian Supreme Court has ordered a review of the case against two members of the punk band Pussy Riot.

headline.main: Russia: Review for Punk Band Case
headline.print_headline: Russia: Review for Punk Band Case
